official_title: Expressing the sense of the Congress in opposition to the efforts of certain groups to impose a sexual agenda on the children of the United States.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that it opposes the proposals of the Adolescent Pregnancy and Parenthood Advisory Council of Texas and the Sex Information and Education Council of the United States.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress in opposition to the efforts of certain groups to impose a sexual agenda on the children of the United States.
